actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Advisory Committee Act to include within the definition of "advisory committee", the Advisory Commission on Intergovernmental Relations.

summary.text: Includes within the definition of "advisory committee", for purposes of the Federal Advisory Committee Act, the Advisory Commission on Intergovernmental Relations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Advisory Committee Act to include within the definition of "advisory committee", the Advisory Commission on Intergovernmental Relations.
